citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
* A facility representative was not available on 12/7/15 at 12:15 PM to do a facility inspection.
* Inspector knocked on the front door of the licensees house. Inspector called telephone number given by the
licensee. Inspector waited required 30 minute time for licensee to show up.
* Copy of inspection report was sent by certified & regular mail.
Additional Inspectors
Thornton Karl, Animal Care Inspector

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
*  A facility representative was not available on 12/7/15 at  12:15 PM to do a facility inspection.
*  Inspector knocked on the front door of the licensees house.  Inspector called telephone number given by the
licensee.  Inspector waited required 30 minute time for licensee to show up.   
 *  Copy of inspection report was sent by certified & regular mail.
Additional Inspectors
Thornton Karl, Animal Care Inspector
